ygData.subject: RE: [eqbards] Symphonic Harmony reminder please
ygData.msgSnippet: Here is how it decodes by eqcaster: Symphonic Harmony Lowers you on the target s hate list by -100 ... Classes: None ... Range to Target: 100 feet ... Skill:
ygData.messageBody:
Here is how it decodes by eqcaster:

Symphonic Harmony
Lowers you on the target's hate list by -100
----------------------------------------------------------------------------
----
Classes: None
----------------------------------------------------------------------------
----
Range to Target: 100 feet
----------------------------------------------------------------------------
----
Skill: Wind Instruments
Allowable Targets: All
----------------------------------------------------------------------------
----
Resistance Check: None
----------------------------------------------------------------------------
----
Spell Duration: Instant
Casting Time: 3.0 seconds
----------------------------------------------------------------------------
----
Spell cast on you: You feel at peace.
Spell cast on someone: Soandso looks peaceful.


Eqcaster is a program that reads your sp_eff.dat file and 'decodes' it.
Yes, this is client side and the server can change stuff but it seems to be
the best spell reference available. http://www.eqcaster.com

Sylly Songsynger




-----Original Message-----
From: RKR [mailto:rkroads@...]
Sent: Sunday, January 14, 2001 2:55 PM
To: eqbards@egroups.com
Subject: [eqbards] Symphonic Harmony reminder please


I just cannot find where I read about what Symphonic Harmony does (effect of
Symphonic Saber)!

Remind me please?

Thanks!

Maravana Vireo
57 Bard of Deadly Virtues
Mithaniel Marr
